title: Calligraphy
marks:
Inscription, Marks, and Seal

R edge of decorate
description: six lines of bold, expressive calligraphy on yellowish/tan paper; paper is decorated with impressed and highlighted image of a young woman standing next to a tall, gnarled tree, foliage and stones on ground, inscription at L; rectangular intaglio stamp LLC
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
